name: Krowdthink Ltd
goal:
Developer of a privacy preserving, secure-by-design, location based social engagement platform.
Extended for counter-terror prevention and general crowd safety features under funding direct from UK Office of Counter Terrorism.
Further extended to enable venue brand projection and protection through simplified complaints management and digital community engagement.
Company also advocates human rights in the digital data context and has built foundational technology and methods to 'do no harm' in a digital social platform context, widely recognised as an 'impact economy' digital innovator, as well as a leader in the Mydata movement.
interests: Communication, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
GDPR - General Data Protection regulation
E-Privacy and PECR (Privacy of Electronic Regulation)
Smart City - Citizen Engagement
